solution_line_template: If Devin is {devin_age} years old, then Eden is {eden_multiplier} * {devin_age} years = {eden_age} years old.
Since Eden's mom two times older than Eden, her age is {eden_age} years * {mom_multiplier} = <<{eden_age}*{mom_multiplier}={mom_age}>>{mom_age} years.
In total, they have {mom_age} years + {eden_age} years + {devin_age} years = <<{mom_age}+{eden_age}+{devin_age}={total_age}>>{total_age} years
The average age for the three is {total_age} years / {number_of_people} people = <<{total_age}/{number_of_people}={average_age}>>{average_age} years/person
